== About ==
 We give technical support to the OpenSource Community :)

==== Goals of this Team ====
1. Give technical support to the Open Source community.
2. Mentor new supporters to enhance quality.

=== Joining ===
==== Joining  Requirements: ====
1. Basic understanding of linux-based operating systems.
2. Know Team's System and regulations.

==== Joining Steps ====
1. Register yourself on launchpad.net, '''<nowiki>[[https://login.launchpad.net/+new_account|here]]</nowiki>'''. 
2. Then join the Ubuntu Egypt Support Squad, '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg-support/+join|here]]</nowiki>'''.
